entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Murdochville

entry.title: Monday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight. Wind becoming east 20 km/h early this evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Clearing. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 14.
